execution_plan.description: Retrieve customers from the EU sales database whose updated_at is older than one year.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, email, full_name, country, marketing_ok, updated_at, 'sales_eu' AS source FROM customers WHERE updated_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 year';

execution_plan.description: Retrieve customers from the US sales database whose updated_at is older than one year.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, email, full_name, country, marketing_ok, updated_at, 'sales_us' AS source FROM customers WHERE updated_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 year';
